alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Clark; Jackson; Trempealeau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 01 at 2:50PM CST until January 03 at 6:00PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Clark, Buffalo, Trempealeau and Jackson Counties. * WHEN...From Monday evening through Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There remains the potential for this storm to shift north or south. Travelers are urged to keep up to date with the latest forecasts and statements concerning this potentially hazardous travel situation.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
